programme.title: Whitlam: The Power And The Passion
programme.desc: An extraordinary story of the hard-fought rise and dramatic fall of a visionary Australian Prime Minister during one of the countrys most turbulent eras. Heroic to some, flawed to others, his changes still echo today.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Costa visits a community recovering from floods, Jane looks at new plant varieties, Tammy explores lush green walls, Millie plants long season crops, Sophie profiles fragrant flowers, and we meet a duo of daffodil lovers.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Wan Kantri: The Next 50 Years
programme.desc: Embark on a powerful journey into the heart of Papua New Guinea, 50 years on from independence. Wan Kantri captures the spirit and traditions of a country deeply connected to its roots and confidently looking to the future.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: Trouble in paradise: Tensions after Pacific journalists were excluded from the PMs presser. A US podcast outfit with truly a podcast for everyone. Plus Taliban tourism: influencers give Afghanistan an Instagram glow-up.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Dr Richard Harris is a medical hero. When a soccer team became trapped in a Thai cave in 2018, the South Australian anaesthetist played a pivotal role in getting them out. How will Anh portray his courageous spirit?

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News NSW brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Amy Greenbank, plus weather with Tom Saunders.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Four contestants vie for the Hard Quiz Big Brass Mug! Which topic will triumph: Peter Sellers, The Chats, beer... or will The Great Fire of London destroy them all? Play along at home!

programme.title: Would I Lie To You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon, Lee Mack and David Mitchell return in an episode packed with some of the best bits from the series.

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: How influential was Charlie Kirk on the MAGA movement? Chas and John discuss Kirks controversial legacy, Americas deep divide and the political fallout. Plus Trumps bold plan to turbocharge his mass deportation machine.

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Matt and Sophie want to build a giant family house of fun with secret dens, a firemans pole and a James Bond room. Kevin cant wait to see the final outcome.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Tammy meets a foliage fashionista, Sophie refreshes wicking beds, Josh visits a buzzing wildlife garden, Hannah grafts a grapevine, Millie explores a farm growing rare vegetables, and we meet an artist with a meadow garden.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Myf Warhurst continues her van life odyssey in northern New South Wales and Western Australia. Setting out to discover when van life became a thing, she wonders if there comes a time when this nomadic life loses its appeal?

programme.title: If Youre Listening
programme.desc: Theres been a spike in antisemitic attacks and recently ASIO revealed that some of them were coordinated by Iran in an effort to destablise their enemies. So is this a signal of Irans strength - or a weakening regime?

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: When a woman confesses to murdering her husband, the Lyell team must determine if all is as it seems. Meanwhile, Simone is shocked to be reunited with a detective from her childhood and struggles to untangle her past.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News NSW brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Amy Greenbank, plus weather with Tom Saunders.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Lisa Millar is on an odyssey to discover Australias largest inland waterway, the magnificent Gippsland Lakes in Victoria. It is home to over 300 native wildlife species, including the rare and endangered Burrunan dolphin.

programme.title: The Family Next Door
programme.desc: Isabelle unravels the truth, but is faced with a dilemma, is she prepared to destroy one family, to heal another? (Final)

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Special: The Fumbled Fall Guys Fest
programme.desc: When Harry and Gem decide to throw a Fall Guys party for their best friend Screen Goblin, a disagreement puts their plans in jeopardy! Will they be able to compromise, or will the party end up an epic fail?

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan tries to hide his newfound secret power: kitting. But after using it to save his classmates he proudly admits it.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Galette day this year is eventful for Marinette; Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! Will Ladybug still manage to establish herself as queen of the day?

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Soccer Saga
programme.desc: Kyle asks Maudie and Ava to make a video of his soccer match but Maudie discovers something about the game is not quite right.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The Farmers tractor wont start, so when his back is turned Shaun and the flock decide to give it a quick make-over.

programme.title: Fresh Off The Boat
programme.desc: Eddie and Emery are struggling to find the perfect gift for their mother, who feels that Santa could use some reinvention. Jessica and Louis convince Evan that Santa Claus is a scientist with multiple degrees from Princeton.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.sub-title: The Death Song Of Uther Pendragon
programme.desc: Arthur risks everything when he summons a spirit from the dead - Uther.

programme.title: Mythbusters: Theres Your Problem!
programme.desc: The mysterious world of animals is the focus of this episode, in which the MythBusters find out if elephants are afraid of mice; if bloodhounds can be thrown off the scent; and if bulls really are attracted to red.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: Harrys Minecraft pirate ship has been destroyed and theres only one person who could have done it: Gem. Harry decides to take revenge by being really annoying, even though she swears shes not guilty!

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going as the sun comes up with continuous music videos, from new releases to classics and the songs weve long forgotten.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Have the Bears lost their survival instincts by living in the modern world? Grizz wants to know, so he purposefully gets the Bears lost in the deep forest.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Julekas mother gets akumatized into Captain Hardrock. Steering an impregnable ship and armed with a pirate sword, she wants to blast her music across Paris. Prepare to board, mateys Ladybug and Cat Noir!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Puzzling Pet Day
programme.desc: When the Animal Shelter visits school to audition kids for a television commercial, Maudie suspects a crime is happening right under everyones noses.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Shaun thinks the Farmers new metal detector looks like fun - until it detects the ring on the end of the bulls nose!

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con man becomes romantically involved with a novice femme fatale, only to break up when she gets too close. Three years later, his former flame shows up where both of them are working separate, but equally elaborate cons.

programme.title: Heartbreak High
programme.desc: Everyone is left shocked when Sam Robinson returns to Hartley High to fill a new teaching role.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Alya, Rose and Juleka, now the Punishers Trio, and Adriens cousin Felix.

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Pestering Prank Caller
programme.desc: When a prank caller targets Ezra and his neighbours, Maudie believes the Inbestigators can track down who is making the mystery calls.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
programme.desc: Twilight and the rest of the Mane Six head to the Crystal Empire for the "Crystalling" of Cadence and Shining Armors new baby while Twilight takes the opportunity to present Starlight with her first friendship lesson.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Octonaughty returns with a whole new dimension of naughtiness. This calls for a whole new dimension of superhero! Learn about cubes, and other ways of arranging blocks in three dimensions with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the kids are inspired by nature to create a green space that is for relaxation, reflection and mindfulness. Its a place to breathe in nature and forget about your worries.

programme.title: Bitesize Daily
programme.desc: Connecting to our world, good friends help wellbeing, being a good friend.

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak
programme.desc: We find out how Australias social media ban for under-16s will actually work.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Phils latest secret mission takes him to Dorking, where he finds a period property thats charming on the outside and a little bit alarming on the inside.

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Zaf and Adam go undercover in an attempt to stop a terrorist bomb attack.

programme.title: rage Vault: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Oooh madone! Youre invited for a sit down with the Soprano family, so bring the baked ziti and get ready for a night featuring the best hits from the cult-classic show.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig tells you about tails (and tales) with Rob Beckett, Daliso Chaponda, Sarah Millican and Alan Davies.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Dream Build
programme.desc: With spectacular views of the Glass House Mountains, the design of Maleny House was influenced by the philosophies of Zen and Japanese design. It is a beautiful house blending Asian aesthetics with an Australian touch.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Marinette gets expelled from school, but an even bigger problem awaits her - she must face a sentimonster that has taken the appearance of...Ladybug!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Sleepover Secret
programme.desc: Pixie is furious when something she privately told Ava is made public, so Maudie resolves to find out how Pixies secret got out.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
programme.desc: As Starlight tries to pick up the pieces of the failed reunion with her old friend, Twilight and the rest of the Mane Six struggle to save the Crystal Empire from an eternal winter.

programme.title: Lets Dance
programme.desc: Today were going to learn how to Breakdance

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: You can still have a green thumb if you dont have a garden. Tammy and Pia build their very own rainforest for the bathroom, which will thrive off all the moisture and steam to grow beautiful, oxygen rich ferns.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: Meet a medieval estate agent with some fancy castles to sell and hear how knights training was long and hard and how they wore family crests called coats of arms to stand out in battle.

programme.title: Dream Build
programme.desc: This episode features a Melbourne family who have built a futurist house with a backyard transformed by a man-made hill.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Four contestants vie for the Hard Quiz Big Brass Mug! Which topic will triumph: Peter Sellers, The Chats, beer... or will The Great Fire of London destroy them all? Play along at home!

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: How influential was Charlie Kirk on the MAGA movement? Chas and John discuss Kirks controversial legacy, Americas deep divide and the political fallout. Plus Trumps bold plan to turbocharge his mass deportation machine.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.sub-title: Ssh! Upsy Daisys Having A Rest!
programme.desc: Upsy Daisy simply wants to rest in her bed but is disturbed by one character after another.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: Is it too late for the Sound Collector to see the Seed Collector before winter?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing plays with a new orange balloon but when he bounces on it too enthusiastically, it pops!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George sits in the trolley in the supermarket while Peppa finds the things on Mummys shopping list. Soon, they have everything they need, as well as something that wasnt on the list - a delicious chocolate cake.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Gloop the Third is on his way to invade Earth, while the PJ Masks try to find a way to escape the Planet Gloop in order to stop him.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud. Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird come to her rescue.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are shocked to find their new bedrooms empty! Mummy and Daddy Pig tell them they will be the ones decorate their rooms, so they all go to a furniture shop to create the best rooms ever!

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets are planning an epic surprise pool party for Phillipas birthday but when things get out of hand, they forget the golden pool rule: keep the gate shut.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Katya struggles to choose the perfect fruit punch for the Blue Moon party, but with her friends help, she creates a magical drink that everyone loves.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley and the children make a museum exhibit about their home and friends.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie plays a board game with best friends Nina and Akil, learning how to deal with feelings of impatience, winning and losing.

programme.title: Play School Show Time
programme.desc: Strum and hum along with Josh Pyke on the ukulele as he visits the elephants, monkeys and koalas at the Play School Zoo in his whimsical rendition of Going To The Zoo.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: A techno dance party to remember! The Wiggles are planning a surprise birthday party for Dorothy the Dinosaur, filled with all of her favourite things.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Singing the alphabet song should be as easy as A, B, C for the Alphablocks, shouldnt it? This episode has fun with the whole alphabet and their letter names.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its Valentines Day! Daddy Pig gives Mummy Pig a card, but Mummys card to Daddy hasnt arrived. Everyone is sad that Daddy didnt get a card. But when the post finally arrives, theres a big surprise.

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes search for honeysuckles, leaving behind a trail of berries to help find their way back. But when Wasabi eats the trail, theyre stranded in the dark!

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Otto keeps getting a cramp while teaching dance class, so Vida teaches him to stretch!

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Little Woo would like Stanley to help them find more noisy things in the museum. Firstly, they go through the other exhibits to see what can go in their new noisy exhibition.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Night Ninja kidnaps An Yu and takes over mystery Mountain. Teent tries to save the day, but his anger keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets are planning an epic surprise pool party for Phillipas birthday but when things get out of hand, they forget the golden pool rule: keep the gate shut.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Gordon and Rebecca do the same work - but they go about it differently. When Rebecca tries to be more like Gordon, it doesnt go well... for Gordon!

programme.title: Reef School
programme.desc: When Mr Flip takes the Reefies on an excursion to explore an underwater shipwreck, Ray goes missing and the excursion quickly turns into a search for a missing stingray.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Lachy and Simon join The Wiggles for story time, they tell the best stories and love making people laugh, but something is different this time. The reactions theyre getting are not what they expected!

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: The "Pretty Big Thing" is scaring people from going to work. The Mechas must find out what it is!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On a trip to the beach, Mum teaches Bluey to throw, while Bingo and Dad get creative with a funny shaped stick.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends come to school early to have breakfast together. At the breakfast club, they learn about how food gives you energy and talk about their favourite breakfast foods.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: How do you stop a runaway rolling ferris wheel? Mojo and Bo need to figure it out fast!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts test drive the brand new Terra-Gup 2, a pangolin-inspired, armored gup, while rescuing creatures from a rockslide in the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey wants to know why Dad is always bossing her around.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: When Duggees flowers look very sad, everyone does a rain dance to help make it rain.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Banana Superstars show is stopped when Evil Pea steals his peel. Supertato races against him to get it back, but trouble hits when a giant banana statue collapses onto the stage.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: The Tombliboos are playing their music so fast that everybody does everything very fast.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector goes on an autumn search and finds a sound so huge hes blown away!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Flop is pushing Bing on the swing in the park when Pando arrives and wants to have a go too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its Peppa Pigs birthday and she wakes up very early - she doesnt waste any of her special day. Peppa gets a present then its time for her party. Daddy Pig does some funny magic tricks and makes a birthday cake appear.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Gloop III and Owlette get locked into a battle of flying machine : Owlglider vs Gloopster. But Gloop hires alien mechanics Carly and Cartoka to give his ship some extra boost.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. But Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today the new baby seat has arrived, but the family car has no room for it! With help from Peppa and George, Daddy Pig chooses a bigger car for the family.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets build the Grand Crabby Hotel to protect rock pool sea creatures from the seagulls, but soon learn that despite being tough they shouldnt be moved.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Zoes excitement spoils the Super Monsters game, but her friends turn it into a chance to help her practice her powers, teaching teamwork, patience, and friendship.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Myrtles aunt is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her somewhere to stay.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie prepares for Grandpas visit by tidying up, greeting him, and finally dealing with having to let him go.

programme.title: Play School Show Time
programme.desc: Join the Australian Chamber Orchestra for their stunning rendition of Brahms Lullaby.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Join Caterina and Lachy on a time travelling adventure and see dances from the past! From the 80s, to the 20s, all the way even to the Elizabethan Era, just how far back in time can they go?

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.sub-title: The Cat Sat On The Mat
programme.desc: The Alphablocks sing, the bat and the rat dance - but will the cat ever get up off the mat? This episode has fun with AT and the words mat, cat, rat, bat, hat and vat.

programme.desc: Peppa and her friends come to school early to have breakfast together. At the breakfast club, they learn about how food gives you energy and talk about their favourite breakfast foods.

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Its the great Sunday Roast, the day when the Potatodons hides are extra hot, crispy and delicious!

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Koas cone makes him feel special, so before Vida takes it off, he asks for one more day to wear it.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Peggy calls Stanley up to pose for the towns art club at the community centre. Can Do! Stanley dons a firefighters costume and strikes a pose, only for him to get distracted by a wonky shelf.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Someone is causing mischief in the city. The PJMs blame the villains; the villains blame each other!

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets build the Grand Crabby Hotel to protect rock pool sea creatures from the seagulls, but soon learn that despite being tough they shouldnt be moved.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Kenji hears that he must travel home to Japan alone, he gets scared and tries to hide. So, Thomas sets out to find him.

programme.title: Reef School
programme.desc: The Reefies are excited to get their fins dirty in a sand-digging competition, but Surg the surgeonfish is nervous about trying new activities and needs some convincing before shell join in.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Tsehay challenges Lucia, Lachy, and Wags to stand like statues, but oh no! Wags is having a hard time staying still. What should they do? Will the local vet, Dr. Kay Nine, be able to help Wags stand still?

programme.desc: When super sticky slime spills on Zee and MacBarm, the Mechas have to figure out how to pull them apart.

programme.desc: Mr Potato visits the school to sing the vegetable song and tell the children about the importance of eating five fruits or vegetables a day. But which team will win his quiz?

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Prestons stunt plane is in trouble, so its Mojo to the rescue in the jet top!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: Octo-Agent Min discovers a decimated bamboo forest, a habitat crucial to pandas, and alerts the Octonauts.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey asks Dad to help her draw a dragon for her story.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree, because she thinks its broken.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea wears a giant powersuit so powerful it knocks Supertato across the supermarket aisles. Carrot and Supertato plan to outsmart Evil Pea so she will lose her new powers.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys playgroup is at odds when Indys baby hospital collides with Rustys knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they find their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.desc: Kate Reids croissants have been called the worlds best. But how did a Formula 1 engineer battling a near-fatal eating disorder end up perfecting pastry?

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: National Press Club Address
programme.desc: Dr Vanessa Pirotta, leading wildlife scientist, addresses the National Press Club of Australia on the topic of "Australias Scientific Future: Built on Education, Connection and Investment".

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News through the day. We have reporters in more places, to tell you whats happening and why it matters. Ros Childs brings you the latest news and information.

programme.title: ABC News With Joe OBrien
programme.desc: Joe OBrien brings you a comprehensive summary of the days events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on whats going on.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe OBrien.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: The latest breaking news and a comprehensive roundup of the days best stories from across Australias states and regions. With reporters in more places ABC News tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: In the Northern Ireland town of Ballymena locals are waging a war on migrants, attacking their homes and forcing them out of town. Its the worst violence in a wave of anti-immigration protests across the UK this summer.
